content.full_text: Abraham Lincoln to J. C. Louderman and Company, 14 March 18521
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to J. C. Louderman and Company, 14 March 18521
citations: J. C. Louderman & Company to Abraham Lincoln.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed this letter.

2The letter from J. C. Louderman and Company that Lincoln references, with his memorandum
                  included at the bottom of it, has not been located.

3No other correspondence between Lincoln and J. C. Louderman and Company in 1852 has
                  been located. However, Lincoln previously purchased 7.25 yards of carpet from the
                  company in the spring of 1849.J. C. Louderman & Company to Abraham Lincoln.

structured_content.text: Abraham Lincoln to J. C. Louderman and Company, 14 March 18521
